name: Energy Transfer LP
summary: Energy Transfer LP is one of the largest and most diversified midstream energy companies in the United States, specializing in the transportation, storage, and terminaling of natural gas, crude oil, natural gas liquids, and refined products. Headquartered in Dallas, Texas and founded in 1996, the company operates over 125,000 miles of pipelines and related infrastructure across 44 states and holds significant interests in Sunoco LP and USA Compression Partners.
